title: Life cycle assessment methods for investigating novel food packaging systems
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3VA00380A, Tutorial Review

Ina Bremenkamp, Maria J. Sousa Gallagher
The high volume of plastic waste generated and its potential harm to wildlife and ecosystems are negative consequences of poor end-of-life food packaging management.
